name: Scrambled! (FeuilleMorte Entertainment)
description:
Short arcade shooter in which you, a brave Chicken, rise against the farm and start to kill everything. Standard video game stuff. 15 levels, 3 bosses, 6 upgrades, so many numbers. See if you can do everything!

The main goal for this game was to have many interconnected systems around the E.G.G. It is a weapon, but also an extra life, so you should think about where to put it. It can hurt you when it falls, so you have to plan in advance how to place it. It is also the store's currency, so it might be better to place it immediately at an inconvenient place rather than wait and risk losing it.


Controls:
   - W, A, S, D / Arrow keys / Left joystick: Move left/right , Jump, Go through platforms
   - Space / Button X: Shoot
   - Enter / Button A: Spawn E.G.G. (plus you need to call the egg, else, they won't listen)
   - R: Activate invincible mode in main menu (in case you want to see everything but don't have time to die) Made for the Jame Gam: Easter Edition, by FeuilleMorte Entertainment


Assets used:          User Interface pack - Wenrexa: https://wenrexa.itch.io/ui-different02
        Farm visuals - Mattyg763: https://mattyg763.itch.io/simple-farm-assets
         Weapons assets pack - Kay Lousberg: https://kaylousberg.itch.io/gun-assets
         She Came From Outer Space [Electro Swing Remix] - Musical Ghost: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lgiacjQGUoA
        Farming crops - TheDarkBear: https://thedarkbear.itch.io/farm-crop-pack

current version: V2.3
